General.Description: Syscoin is a global network, a distributed ledger, a decentralized database and a blockchain. Like Bitcoin, Syscoin is one of the powerful coin in global network. It is a distributed ledger, a decentralized database and also a blockchain. For a cryptocurrency, Syscoin provides entrepreneur the infrastructure to trade goods, assets, digital certificates and data secure. The SYS tokens are tradeable  and compatible with any kind of an altcoin, a digital currency.
General.Features: SYS is fully decentralized platform. In the marketplace, the Blockmarket Wallet offers all the features needed such as exchange and transfer Syscoin. Another feature that makes it a top choice of users all over the world is the 16 tutorial videos which are the helpful guide for the beginners to start buying and selling their products or services quickly. aLast but not least, there are other outstanding features such as Aliases, resell other products, arbitrated escrow, digital certificates, etc.
General.Technology: Such a cryptocurrency, Syscoin was built based on the updated database technology like blockchain. By using OP1 to OP16 standard script op-codes, it is also an altcoin, tradeable token with a set of smart contracts thoroughly tested and built on the Bitcoin scripting system.
